EmailTemplate.description: Email to be sent to MR team when license received date is expired with out entering the Submission
EmailTemplate.name: License Expiration date
EmailTemplate.subject: Urgent Action Required - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}-{!Case.State__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: URGENT ACTION REQUIRED - This license for case # {!Case.CaseNumber}, State -{!Case.State__c}has expired and reflects no submission date in the case
